remarks: Restricted quantifier version of Theorem 19.28 of [Margaris] p. 90.  It is valid only when the domain of quantification is inhabited. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 5-Aug-2018.)
statement:
r19.28m.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
r19.28m $p |- ( E. x x e. A -> ( A. x e. A ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( ph /\ A. x e. A ps ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
